title: Practice Challenge

hints.text: Object.keys(inventory).length for count, loop through Object.values() to sum

commonMistakes.consequence: This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.
This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.
commonMistakes.correction:
Calling Object.keys() on non-object:
   Object.keys([1,2,3])  // Works but returns ['0', '1', '2'] (indices as strings)
   Object.keys('hello')  // Works but returns ['0', '1', '2', '3', '4']

commonMistakes.consequence: This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.
